name: GTM+ WordPress
author: MeasureSchool

sections.description:
Do not worry about the implementation of the Google Tag Manager Code anymore! Simply login via your Google Account and install GTM on your WordPres Website under a minute.

Latest News & Updates

Head over to https://gtmpluswp.com/ and sign up for our newsletter in order to receive news about new features and updates

develop a digital marketing plan to help you grow your business & happy client base.
sections.installation:
1. Upload GTM+ WordPress to the /wp-content/plugins/gtmpluswp directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings / Google Tag Manager+ WordPress and log in with your Google Account or enter your Google Tag Manager container ID manually

short_description: This plugin easily places the Google Tag Manager container code onto your WordPress website, so you do not have to worry about a manual installation.
